NAME: Deallocate Components - Hide
ROOTSTOCK__DESCRIPTION__C:
Hide 'Deallocate' action if either of the criteria is met:
1. Order has no components
2. Order is 'Planned' or 'Closed' 
3. Order is either 'Rework' or 'Refurb', and NOT in 'Allocated' or 'Ready for activity' status

record.rstk__wocst_div__r.rstk__sydiv_alloc_active__c == true &&  
record.rstk__wocst_estind__c == false &&
(record.rootstock__Number_of_Demand_Lines_Allocated__c > 0 || 
((record.rstk__wocst_reworkind__c == true || record.rstk__wocst_refurbind__c == true) && (record.rstk__wocst_ordsts__c == '3' || record.rstk__wocst_ordsts__c == '4' )))

NAME: Extract Components - Hide
ROOTSTOCK__DESCRIPTION__C:
Hide Extract Components action if either criteria is met:
1. Routing is disabled
2. WO is of type 'Rework'
3. WO is in either 'Planned' or 'Closed' status.
4. WO has components.
5. WO Item's type is 'Labor'
ROOTSTOCK__TARGET_VALUE__C:
record.rstk__wocst_itemtype__c != 'L' &&
record.rstk__wocst_div__r.rstk__sydiv_routing_active__c == true && record.rstk__wocst_reworkind__c == false && 
record.rstk__wocst_ordsts__c != '1' && record.rstk__wocst_ordsts__c != '9' && record.rootstock__Number_of_Demand_Lines__c == 0

record.rstk__sotax_fedrate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_fedrate__c <= 100 && 
record.rstk__sotax_staterate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_staterate__c <= 100 &&
record.rstk__sotax_countyrate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_countyrate__c <= 100 && 
record.rstk__sotax_cityrate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_cityrate__c <= 100 &&
record.rstk__sotax_transitrate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_transitrate__c <= 100 && 
record.rstk__sotax_misc1rate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_misc1rate__c <= 100 &&
record.rstk__sotax_misc2rate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_misc2rate__c <= 100 && 
record.rstk__sotax_misc3rate__c >= 0 && record.rstk__sotax_misc3rate__c <= 100
ROOTSTOCK__DESCRIPTION__C: Update Total Tax Rate
ROOTSTOCK__TARGET_VALUE__C: Number(record.rstk__sotax_fedrate__c) + Number(record.rstk__sotax_staterate__c) + Number(record.rstk__sotax_countyrate__c) +  Number(record.rstk__sotax_cityrate__c) +  Number(record.rstk__sotax_transitrate__c) +  Number(record.rstk__sotax_misc1rate__c) +  Number(record.rstk__sotax_misc2rate__c) +  Number(record.rstk__sotax_misc3rate__c)

Hide 'Extract Operations & Components' action only if either of the criteria is met:
1. Routing is disabled
